lines.text: Mr. Ramirez, my mother taught me never to talk to strangers.
If you never talk to strangers, you'll never meet anyone new.
The Buddhist have a saying, "If you meet your master on the road, kill him."

[to Tony Ramirez]
This is how I like my men... wet... and naked.
I think sex is overrated, Dr. Taylor. Don't you?
No, I guess not. You'd be out of a job, wouldn't you?
I love that little scar... on your mouth.
You just don't give up, do you?

[to private detective]
I think I'm falling in love with someone. But I gotta write a check first to make sure he's not a psychopath.
So good to have you back to your old self, Sarah.
